messages.text: Arc is so amazing and kewl and silly and awesome and great and fun and beautiful and breathtaking and hilarious and nice and cosy ðŸ’œ
messages.author: SCHNIG

messages.text:
I want to thank you not just as an individual but as a conglomerate.

We as a community unite together under your joy, your happiness, your dedication to your fans and to yourself.

We have been here for your highest, and through the lowest through the tough times and through the most joyous times.

Here to this milestone and many many more to come.
messages.author: ORDER

messages.text:
ARC, THANK YOU FOR ALL YOU'VE DONE.

I'm glad I found you thank you for being so kind and accepting to us.

I appreciate the time you've spent with us. You deserve everything you've gotten so far, we'll continue to support you as you continue streaming.

Please keep being yourself and don't change, we appreciate you the way you are.

Thanks again and have a nice 1 year stream anniversary stinky- I mean Arc. <3

ps: I don't hate you

- Much love Vegito
messages.author: VEGITO

messages.text:
Arc, for the past couple months I've known you, you've been hopelessly horrible at everything gaming lmao, but that personality I see in every stream makes even the worst gamer you are, 100 times better than a good gamer with no personalityâ€¦

I'm here to tell you, happy anniversary and I hope you have a wonderful couple more anniversaries to come!
messages.author: MOLDY

messages.text:
From me personally, and from the bitlings as a collective, thank you sooo so much for everything you do!

You've created a wonderful community and it's the community that I feel most a part of online.

Please keep being you! You're a wonderful entertainer and a wonderful person!

Please please please remember that the bitling army is a loyal one, and we will never leave your side!

Here's to another year!

From Hobbit <3
messages.author: H0B81T

messages.text:
Hello Arc! I hope you are feeling wonderful. Congratulations on your affiliate anniversary!

You are awesome Arc, don't let the voices in your head fool you! You are funny, you are sincere, you are lovely.

We appreciate that you do your best to spend time with us, we appreciate that you try your best to stream.

We all know it doesn't always work out and that's okay, we understand. We will be here, waiting for you, don't even worry about it!

I don't know if it means anything but, we are all proud of you!
messages.author: RABBITTHEDEVIL

messages.text:
Thank you for streaming for a WHOLE ONE YEAR!!!

It's not easy keeping at it for such a long time and I'm proud of you for doing so.

I'm happy to have found you and everyone else through Rabbit and I don't regret a single moment.

I hope you keep going at it and stream for another 9 years!!!
messages.author: SHEENO

messages.text:
This time one year ago an amazing digital cat started her journey to become the silliest of all the vtubers and today one year later she made so many friends and day by day grew sillier and sillier.

Thanks arc I'm sorry I can't make it to every stream but I always cherish every stream I make it to.

From the weirdest bucket, thank you and once again happy one year streaming anniversary.
messages.author: THEBUCKETMASTER

messages.text:
HAPPY 1 YEARS ANNIVERSARY ARC ðŸŽ‰ðŸŽ‰ðŸŽŠðŸŽŠ

Congratulations on your 1 year journey that you have accomplished and the community you build along the way.

It's also nice that I got the chance to meet another cool, amazing and comfy streamer and Although sometimes I'm lurking it's always so much fun hanging out with everyone.

And remember this day, the day your Star started to glow more bright and shiny, that Star will become a shooting star one day.

That day you'll be a big streamer and we'll be there watching along and supporting you, but take it slow there's no rush.

Stay Frosty - Link ðŸ’š
messages.author: LINKKNIGHT

messages.text:
I know I usually lurk, but it is always a delight to tune in to your streams.

It's such a pleasant place to simply exist for a while without worrying about everything else going on in life.

Your personality, vibe, and voice create this perfect mix of comfort and fun.

Thanks for creating a space that feels so easy to return to, and so comfortable just to be in.

I'm looking forward to all the streams still to come <3
messages.author: JAY

messages.text:
Happy anniversary Rc racing car Arcy.

Yes I am aware that I am the most stinkiest person in the server for showering once every 2 weeks but I'm willing to support the funny bri'ish catto from the sidelines.

It has been fun, and I wish you the best in all future endeavors.

- Loved by this cunt, Hunter
messages.author: HUNTERYT

messages.text:
Thank you so much for randomly popping up on my twitch timeline.

You were so funny and welcoming, I felt at home and you almost instantly became one of my oshis.

You've always interacted with as many people as you can, you never make anybody feel left out, and you're one of the sweetest streamers on the platform!

You truly have no idea just how much you're loved and how much we as a community care for you.

You're an inspiration, a hero, and a friend to a lot of people.
messages.author: CHERRYVIDARLIN

messages.text:
Arc! I know we just recently met and became friends but it feels like we have known each other for years now, I love you and all my girlies!

I'm proud of you for always doing your best and for reaching 1 year!! MORE YEARS TO COME LETSGOOOO!

Remember, you can always rely on us just like how we can rely on you. We will always be here!

Love youuuuu lotssss!!! ãƒ¾(â‰§â–½â‰¦*)o
messages.author: ALIEN_AI

messages.text:
Congrats for this first year of streaming Archi!

I may still be a fairly new Bitling, but I must admit I really enjoy being in this community you've built, even as lurker who mostly stays in the walls!

I can feel you're a good person, and I love your vibes.

Here's to 1 year, and many more to come!

Take care, and keep being awesome.

- Tigy
messages.author: KNIGHTOFTIGERS

messages.text:
You've done so amazing this year. You built such a wholesome, welcoming community, made new friends, and tried new things.

I'm really glad I met you, Arc. You're such an amazing person to talk to, you're cute, silly, kind, and just have this thing that makes everyone around you feel way better.

Whether I'm having a rough day or just bing chilling, talking with you and the community always makes everything better.

Thank you for being so kind, funny, and caring you make everyone feel seen and appreciated.

Arc is cute, adorable, caring, kind, loving, wholesome, comforting, chaotic (sometimes), funny, cozy, silly â€” and don't forget OUR PRECIOUS BEAN.

The drinkable yoghurt in the basement fridge ðŸ’šðŸ’šðŸ’š
messages.author: DRINKYOGHURT

messages.text:
ONE YEAR ANNIVERSARY IS HERE!!

HAPPY ANNIVERSARY ARC!!!!!
It's already been 1 year and I hope there will be many more to come!

Thank you Arc for every single amazing stream you've given us.
Thank you for the community days you've arranged, which were very chaotic, but very fun in the end.

The world needs more people like you, you're one of the kindest and sweetest people I have ever met in my life. You always look out for other people and you ALWAYS cheer them up if they are down.
You are a very welcoming person that could make any person smile.
It's always fun to tune in to your streams, even if I don't chat often.
Truly has been a wonderful year with you.

I hope you're having a great day today, smiling and having fun, cause you deserve it all, for all of the trouble and work you've gone through to give us absolute PEAK streams every time, and to whoever says otherwise I say OFF WITH HIS HEAD.

You've survived streaming for a year and I sure as hell hope you'll continue streaming.
I wish you best of luck with your streams and your career as a VTuber, and I am looking forward for your future streams.
Always remember that you ArCANthabyte (sorry, had to add a pun) do anything, as long as you never give up!

I am really thankful for everything you've done for us, and I hope you understand how much your effort means to us.
Please don't stop being yourself because you are WONDERFUL.

Don't worry about who I am right now Â¯\_(ãƒ„)_/Â¯
messages.author: ANONYMOGUS
